implementation_output.changes_summary: Added 'Per-User Daemon Model' subsection to Architecture section in README.md. Describes Windows MultiUserDispatcher pattern (ADR-008) with CreateProcessAsUser isolation, per-user port assignment from username hash (base 8400), per-user config/log isolation, session-aware worker lifecycle. Also describes macOS launchd user agent and Linux systemd user service patterns. Satisfies AC-5.4; ACs 5.1-5.3 were already satisfied by existing README content.
